summary: Six years of proven experience in Java backend, JavaScript/Node.js, and frontend with React/Angular. Proficient in Java, JavaScript, Python, Go; experienced with Spring, Node.js, Angular, React, and microservices architecture. Familiar with Eclipse/IntelliJ/PyCharm and CI/CD tooling. Worked with MySQL, HBase, Cassandra, MongoDB, Couchbase, Kafka, Docker/Kubernetes/OpenShift; Cloud services (Heroku, Firebase); Linux/Windows environments.

experience.title: Java Microservices / Python Developer
experience.description: Worked on CPQ project delivering price configuration for Telecom internet products; implemented RESTful services using Spring Boot, Spring Cloud Stream with Kafka; databases included MySQL and Couchbase; used OpenShift/Docker/Kubernetes, Jenkins; testing with PyTest/JUnit; tracked work with Jira/Confluence/Rally; worked on Linux/Windows.

experience.title: Fullstack Java/JS Developer
experience.description: Health Care Monitoring System project enabling doctors to react to abnormal patient data; technologies included Kafka (Spring Cloud Stream), RESTful services (Spring Boot), Spring Security for auth; MySQL and MongoDB; internal social network using Angular, Node.js, Express and MongoDB.

experience.title: Full stack Java/JS Developer
experience.description: Car renting service built for a company owning its own fleet; RESTful services with Spring Boot, security with Spring Security, MySQL via JPA; Web-scraping application to compare prices using Node.js and MongoDB.
